case.title: Lets Go for a Coffee !! - 25 (London)
case.text:
Hey Dolls ,
Hope y'all doing great ! I said to myself why not try this site and see what pops up lol
So here is the deal guys , I am a young black girl looking for a very handsome gentleman to go and have a drink or coffee and chat all day if needed lol and maybe see each other again if there is chemistry. You gotta be tall , educated , can hold a conversation , a professional , funny , spontaneous and very laid back . You have to be age 27 to 32 not more then that .
No picture no replies babies !! Sorry
